question: Which of the following groups of instruments is required to have communication line between two television relay centres?
option1: Microwave link, telephone, booster relay, satellite
option2: Radio telescope, microwave link, booster relay, telephone
explanation: Microwaves are chosen for satellite communication. Its frequency is high and microwaves can pass through the atmosphere of Earth to reach higher orbit satellites. Radio waves get affected by ionosphere and hence aren’t used.
